lom:description.lom:string: This Exploratorium site is divided into the following sections: Live Eye on the Earth, Great Shakes, Quake Basics, Damage Control, and Active Zone. Each section has a range of multimedia displays of images. A few have videos and real data as well. Case studies include: * Loma Prieta, ten years after * Why the Earth shakes: seismic science * Building for the Big One * 1906: the great shake * Links (an excellent selection) .

lom:title.lom:string: Life Along the Faultline - Seismic Science and Epicenters
